title: WHY ME?...
body:
So.... basically I just bought a name change, took me two weeks to save up 13.9k IP, since im really poor and cant afford RP. I changed my name to KiIlua ZoIydck, the second I bought it I knew I done fucked up, I forgot to look it over and I was in a call with all my friends and they were just.... I cant man please someone help, is there anyway to get a refund? I already submitted a request....

I know its my fault, I should've double checked but this is really..... If you don't know whats wrong with the name its that its misspelled It should be KiIIua Zoldyck, (I use capital is instead of ls)

replies.body:
Since you've already submitted a ticket about this, I recommend waiting for an account specialist to get back to you on this. Response times are a bit delayed, but we'll get someone with you as soon as possible.

Let me know if you have any questions.
